Commentary: He runs in from over the wicket and strikes first ball. He pumps his fist repeatedly and then punches his hand into the ground. Commentary: full, straight and hit back up and over! Backed away, got underneath the length as it tailed in, gave it his all. Safest part of the ground. Long-on and long-off had no chance
Commentary_short: Rubel Hossain to Mohammad Nabi, FOUR runs

Commentary: right in the slot, this has been thumped over long-on. This sure tilts the scales firmly Afghanistan's way. They must be dancing in Kabul already! What a hit
Commentary_short: Rubel Hossain to Mohammad Nabi, SIX runs

Commentary: banged in short, Nabi walked across to pull but withdrew from the pull at the last moment. Not a bad decision under the circumstances
Commentary_short: Rubel Hossain to Mohammad Nabi, no run

Commentary: thick edge but this is up and over the infield, clears short third man. Got inside the line, but wanted to go over point. Just cramped for room a touch but it didn't matter. Super expensive over
Commentary_short: Rubel Hossain to Mohammad Nabi, FOUR runs

Commentary: finishes this off in style. Finishes this MS Dhoni style. Got more height than distance I thought, but it sails over the ropes, near the sightscreen. Afghanistan clinch the series . Went length, Nabi just cleared his front leg and walloped that away.
Commentary_short: Rubel Hossain to Mohammad Nabi, SIX runs
